00035 #include "btkDTFPSignal.h"
00036

00038 // ITK includes
00039 #include "itkDiffusionTensor3DReconstructionImageFilter.h"
00040 #include "itkVector.h"

00043 namespace btk

00045 
00046 DTFPSignal::DTFPSignal(Sequence::Pointer signal, std::vector<Real> *sigmas, std::vector<Vector> *directions, unsigned int bval, Image::Pointer baseline, char displayMode)
00047 {
00048     m_signal = 0;
00049     m_interp = 0;
00050     m_sigmas = sigmas;
00051     m_bval   = bval;
00052 
00053     m_displayMode = displayMode;
00054 
00055     m_directions = directions;
00056 
00057 
00058     Display1(m_displayMode, std::cout << "Loading signal..." << std::endl);
00059 
00060     m_baseline = baseline;
00061     m_baselineInterp = ImageInterpolator::New();
00062     m_baselineInterp->SetInputImage(m_baseline);
00063 
00064     m_N = 0;
00065 
00066     // Getting images sizes
00067     SequenceRegion ssignalRegion = signal->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00068 
00069     unsigned int xMax = ssignalRegion.GetSize(0);
00070     unsigned int yMax = ssignalRegion.GetSize(1);
00071     unsigned int zMax = ssignalRegion.GetSize(2);
00072     unsigned int kMax = ssignalRegion.GetSize(3);
00073 
00074     m_N = kMax;
00075 
00076     if(m_N != m_sigmas->size())
00077     {
00078         std::cout << "Error: there are " << m_N << " images and " << m_sigmas->size() << " sigmas !" << std::endl;
00079         std::exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00080     }
00081 
00082     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tThere are " << kMax << " images of size ");
00083     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << xMax << "x" << yMax << "x" << zMax << "." << std::endl);
00084 
00085 
00086     // Allocate space memory for the array of images
00087     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tAllocating space memory..." << std::flush);
00088     m_signal = new Image::Pointer[kMax];
00089     m_interp = new ImageInterpolator::Pointer[kMax];
00090     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00091 
00092 
00093     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "\tPreparing and interpolating data..." << std::flush);
00094 
00095     // Define images region
00096     ImageRegion iRegion;
00097 
00098     Image::IndexType iIndex;
00099     iIndex[0] = 0; iIndex[1] = 0; iIndex[2] = 0;
00100     iRegion.SetIndex(iIndex);
00101 
00102     Image::SizeType iSize;
00103     iSize[0] = xMax; iSize[1] = yMax; iSize[2] = zMax;
00104     iRegion.SetSize(iSize);
00105 
00106 
00107     // Define sequence region
00108     SequenceRegion sRegion;
00109 
00110     Sequence::SizeType sSize;
00111     sSize[0] = xMax; sSize[1] = yMax;
00112     sSize[2] = zMax; sSize[3] = 1;
00113     sRegion.SetSize(sSize);
00114 
00115 
00116     // Spacing and origin
00117     Sequence::SpacingType spacing = signal->GetSpacing();
00118     Sequence::PointType origin    = signal->GetOrigin();
00119 
00120     Image::SpacingType ispacing;
00121     ispacing[0] = spacing[0]; ispacing[1] = spacing[1]; ispacing[2] = spacing[2];
00122     Image::PointType iorigin;
00123     iorigin[0] = origin[0]; iorigin[1] = origin[1]; iorigin[2] = origin[2];
00124 
00125     // Orientation
00126     itk::Matrix<Real,3,3> dirMat;
00127     itk::Matrix<Real,4,4> iniMat = signal->GetDirection();
00128 
00129     dirMat(0,0) = iniMat(0,0);
00130     dirMat(0,1) = iniMat(0,1);
00131     dirMat(0,2) = iniMat(0,2);
00132 
00133     dirMat(1,0) = iniMat(1,0);
00134     dirMat(1,1) = iniMat(1,1);
00135     dirMat(1,2) = iniMat(1,2);
00136 
00137     dirMat(2,0) = iniMat(2,0);
00138     dirMat(2,1) = iniMat(2,1);
00139     dirMat(2,2) = iniMat(2,2);
00140 
00141 
00142     // Put sequence in array of images
00143     for(unsigned int k=0; k<kMax; k++)
00144     {
00145         // Allocate space memory
00146         m_signal[k] = Image::New();
00147         m_signal[k]->SetRegions(iSize);
00148         m_signal[k]->SetOrigin(iorigin);
00149         m_signal[k]->SetSpacing(ispacing);
00150         m_signal[k]->SetDirection(dirMat);
00151         m_signal[k]->Allocate();
00152 
00153         // Define correct sequence region
00154         Sequence::IndexType sIndex;
00155         sIndex[0] = 0; sIndex[1] = 0;
00156         sIndex[2] = 0; sIndex[3] = k;
00157         sRegion.SetIndex(sIndex);
00158 
00159         // Define iterators
00160         SequenceIterator sIt(signal, sRegion);
00161         ImageIterator iIt(m_signal[k], iRegion);
00162 
00163         // Copy data
00164         for(sIt.GoToBegin(), iIt.GoToBegin(); !sIt.IsAtEnd() && !iIt.IsAtEnd(); ++sIt, ++iIt)
00165             iIt.Set(sIt.Get());
00166 
00167         // Define interpolator
00168         m_interp[k] = ImageInterpolator::New();
00169         m_interp[k]->SetInputImage(m_signal[k]);
00170     } // for k
00171 
00172     Display2(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00173 
00174 
00175     Display1(m_displayMode, std::cout << "done." << std::endl);
00176 }
00177 
00178 DTFPSignal::~DTFPSignal()
00179 {
00180     delete[] m_interp;
00181     delete[] m_signal;
00182 }
00183 
00184 Matrix DTFPSignal::signalAt(Point p)
00185 {
00186     Matrix S(m_N, 1);
00187 
00188     ImageInterpolator::ContinuousIndexType index;
00189     index[0] = p.x(); index[1] = p.y(); index[2] = p.z();
00190 
00191     for(unsigned int i=0; i<m_N; i++)
00192         S(i,0) = m_interp[i]->EvaluateAtContinuousIndex(index);
00193 
00194     return S;
00195 }
00196 
00197 std::vector<Real> *DTFPSignal::getSigmas()
00198 {
00199     return m_sigmas;
00200 }
00201 
00202 Image::SizeType DTFPSignal::getSize()
00203 {
00204     return m_signal[0]->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00205 }
00206 
00207 Image::PointType DTFPSignal::getOrigin()
00208 {
00209     return m_signal[0]->GetOrigin();
00210 }
00211 
00212 Image::SpacingType DTFPSignal::getSpacing()
00213 {
00214     return m_signal[0]->GetSpacing();
00215 }
00216 
00217 std::vector<Vector> *DTFPSignal::getDirections()
00218 {
00219     return m_directions;
00220 }
00221 
00222 itk::Matrix<Real,3,3> DTFPSignal::GetDirection()
00223 {
00224     return m_signal[0]->GetDirection();
00225 }
00226 
00227 itk::DiffusionTensor3D<Real> DTFPSignal::DiffusionTensorAt(Point p)
00228 {
00229     Matrix dwi = this->signalAt(p);
00230 
00231     Image::Pointer *dwiImage = new Image::Pointer[dwi.Rows()];
00232 
00233     itk::Vector<Real,3> vector;
00234 
00235     Image::Pointer refImage = Image::New();
00236     refImage->SetOrigin(m_baseline->GetOrigin());
00237     refImage->SetSpacing(m_baseline->GetSpacing());
00238     refImage->SetDirection(m_baseline->GetDirection());
00239     Image::SizeType size;
00240     size[0] = 1; size[1] = 1; size[2] = 1;
00241     refImage->SetRegions(size);
00242     refImage->Allocate();
00243 
00244     Image::IndexType index;
00245     index[0] = 0; index[1] = 0; index[2] = 0;
00246 
00247     refImage->SetPixel(index, this->BaselineAt(p));
00248 
00249 
00250     itk::DiffusionTensor3DReconstructionImageFilter<Float,Float,Float>::Pointer filter = itk::DiffusionTensor3DReconstructionImageFilter<Float,Float,Float>::New();
00251     filter->SetReferenceImage(refImage);
00252     filter->SetBValue(m_bval);
00253 
00254     unsigned int i=0;
00255     for(std::vector<Vector>::iterator v = m_directions->begin(); v != m_directions->end(); v++, i++)
00256     {
00257         dwiImage[i] = Image::New();
00258         dwiImage[i]->SetOrigin(m_signal[0]->GetOrigin());
00259         dwiImage[i]->SetSpacing(m_signal[0]->GetSpacing());
00260         dwiImage[i]->SetDirection(m_signal[0]->GetDirection());
00261         dwiImage[i]->SetRegions(size);
00262         dwiImage[i]->Allocate();
00263 
00264         vector[0] = v->x(); vector[1] = v->y(); vector[2] = v->z();
00265         dwiImage[i]->SetPixel(index, dwi(i,0));
00266 
00267         filter->AddGradientImage(vector.GetVnlVector(), dwiImage[i]);
00268     }
00269 
00270     filter->Update();
00271     delete[] dwiImage;
00272 
00273     return filter->GetOutput()->GetPixel(index);
00274 }
00275 
00276 Real DTFPSignal::BaselineAt(Point p)
00277 {
00278     ImageInterpolator::ContinuousIndexType cindex;
00279     cindex[0] = p.x(); cindex[1] = p.y(); cindex[2] = p.z();
00280     return m_baselineInterp->EvaluateAtContinuousIndex(cindex);
00281 }
00282 
00283 unsigned int DTFPSignal::GetBValue()
00284 {
00285     return m_bval;
00286 }
